title: What am I supposed to do with this hextech stuff?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: After buying all the IP chests during the event i got just enough fragments and project cores to be 1 short from everything. I even bought $10 worth of chests while the event was still up and i got neither cores nor fragments. Is there any way i can get support to give me a fragment, core, or even just remove them since theyre useless? It's pointless clutter if i can't finish them and since the event ended i can't throw my wallet at the screen to fix it either

replies.body: The plan is to allow leftover materials to be disenchantable, per our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  I don't have an eta on when that will be enabled, but hang tight!
